projects: [{"title":"Text document search engine","start_date":"Apr 2020","end_date":"Apr 2020","description":"A search engine with three-step process Query filtering, Query Augmentation, and Document scoring. Query Augmentation was done through synonyms generation. Document embedding was obtained using the Skip-Gram model. Then Document score was calculated by multiplying cosine similarity of the document and query embedding with unigramBM25 score."},{"title":"Hangout web app","start_date":"Feb 2020","end_date":"Mar 2020","description":"A machine-learning model deployed on the web using Django which can predict a match between people based on a series of questions. And then recommend them movies similar to what they both like."},{"title":"Data extraction using web scrapping","start_date":"Dec 2019","end_date":"Dec 2019","description":"Scraped the weather data from dateandtime website for my other project using python."},{"title":"Predicting Indian Engineer salary","start_date":"Oct 2019","end_date":"Oct 2019","description":"Engineer's previous history performance dataset was used in predicting salary, analyzing the factors affecting Salaries like college CPI, 12th grades, and many different factors and then devising model using Xgboost and hyperparameter tunning using RandomizedSearchCV."}]
